testcase.name: Verify that User should be able to see the profile picture along with the monthly rank
Verify user should be able to see his/her name and competency name on the profile page
Verify user should be able to see their points, overall rank and monthly score on the profile page
Verify that user should be able to view the badges and the count in the badges section
Verify that user should be able to see month and score and rank by clicking on the badges
Verify that user should be able to view the reward if redeemed
